name: icanhascheezburger (lolcats) cleaner
description:
03 November 2011 - This has been in need if an update for a while.  I have not added all the new domains available.
16 April 2011 - Minor tweaks.
29 March 2010 - Removed "Upload", "Vote", etc. tabs,
25 February 2010 - More domains added.  Thanks senax.

Just the pictures.

Works at related sites like loldogs, lolcelebs, engrish, etc.

Not guaranteed to work on every page ...
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document domain(icanhascheezburger.com),
domain(memebase.com),domain(artoftrolling.com),
domain(ihasahotdog.com), domain(roflrazzi.com),
domain(totallylookslike.com), domain(punditkitchen.com),
domain(failblog.org), domain(engrishfunny.com),
domain(onceuponawin.com), domain(upnextinsports.com),
domain(thereifixedit.com), domain(friendsofirony.com),
domain(mthruf.com), domain(thingsthataredoingit.com),
domain(verydemotivational.com), domain(pictureisunrelated.com),
domain(thisisphotobomb.com), domain(ugliesttattoos.com),
domain(hackedirl.com), domain(epicwinftw.com),
domain(musthavecute.com), domain(hawtness.com),
domain(probablybadnews.com), domain(actinglikeanimals.com),
domain(comixed.com), domain(thatwillbuffout.com),
domain(autocompleteme.com), domain(emailsfromcrazypeople.com),
domain(icanhascheezburgerafterdark.com)
{

BODY
{margin-top:10px !important;
 background-image:none !important;
 background:white !important}

.globalNavTop
{margin-top:-15px !important}

#othersites P
{text-align:center !important}

#pane2
{margin-left:auto !important;
 margin-right:auto !important;
 float:none !important}

#mainbody
{padding-bottom:0 !important}

DIV[id^="embedFavorite"],
DIV[id^="EmbedFavorite"],
.suggest,.pane2>P,.socmark_container,
#floattop,#footer,.post H1,.post SMALL,.pane1,
.pane3,.socmarks,.commentnow,#header SPAN+SPAN,
H2,#headerlogo,.templates,#headtext,
.DiggThisButton,#header,.navigation+H3,.panemain,
DIV[id^="google_ads"],#searchform,.left,.right,
.pane2>a:first-child,IMG[title$="nom game"],#leftcolumn,
#toprightad,#rightsky,#panemain,#adfooterad,.tabSet,
IMG[src$="/unis_announce2.jpg"],.postsubtitle,
#embedFavorite0+#md,#bannerlogo,#subfooter,
H3,IMG[src*="/recommendations/"],#pane2>TABLE[cellpadding="3"],
div[id="500_ATF"],DIV[style*="1px solid "],.PDS_Poll,
.content-attribution,.slide-notification,
#showSlideInNotificationContainer,#featured-content-header,
.halfcol,#likesites,#topbanner,#leader_container,
#footer_wrapper,#wpstats,#wpstats2,.recommendations,
#likesites_footer,#uvTab,.embed_holder
{display:none !important}}
